content: MQV-R Channel connector Stainless steel (A4) channel connector used as a longitudinal extender for MQ strut channels ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Universal – complete many different applications using few parts Adjustable – easily fit and repositioned along strut channels Compatible with MQN-R push button channel connectors – for much faster, adaptable assembly Applications Connecting strut channels to various base materials Connecting two MQ strut channels together Compatible with multiple MQ strut channels ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tightening torque: 30 ft-lbf Material composition: Stainless steel, 1.4404 (A4) – EN 10088, AISI 316L Surface finish: Outdoor Plus - Stainless Steel Technical Data | Material composition | Stainless steel, 1.4404 (A4) – EN 10088, AISI 316L | Surface finish | Outdoor Plus - Stainless Steel | Material thickness | 4 mm | Environmental conditions | Outdoor high pollution (C4 – high / C5) ### ITEMS- 304033 - Strut connector MQV-2/2 D-14-R SS316 - Package Size 10 pc
